full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAN CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN POS NE SER JO BO CHEN PO'I RTEN 'BUL MDZAD THOG DGYES PA SKYED PHYIR KHA SKONG BA DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI MKHAN CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN POS NE SER JO BO CHEN PO'I RTEN 'BUL MDZAD THOG DGYES PA SKYED PHYIR KHA SKONG BA DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA ^ SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI TSOGS 'DON DU GZIMS CHUNG BKA' GDAMS PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
